response.original_title: Rückgabe der Kunstschätze an das Grüne Gewölbe
response.overview: Opening the film is a highly visible Soviet coat of arms with translations of Marx’s call “Workers of the world, unite!” into several languages. In the middle of a media circus, representatives of the Soviet Union restituted art treasures to the GDR. The highlight was the return of “evacuated” objects to the Green Vault in Dresden.
response.title: Restitution of the Art Treasures to the Green Vault
